description.name: ETRS89 / LAEA Europe
description.scope: Climate and environmental analysis in Europe.
description.area: Europe - onshore and offshore: Andorra, Austria, Belgium, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Gibraltar, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Kosovo, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Moldova, Monaco, Montenegro, Netherlands, North Macedonia, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, Vatican City.
description.remarks: Suitable for statistical mapping and analysis across Europe.
